articles.title: 9th Congress of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
9th Congress of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was held with splendor in Pyongyang on Saturday and Sunday.
					 Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was present at the congress.
					
					 Also present there were Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam and others and delegates elected at the conferences of the youth league in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Present there as observers were officials of party, administrative and armed forces organs, those in the field of education of youths, a delegation of the Korean Youth League in Japan and a delegation of Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China.
					
					 Man and woman delegates to the congress presented a floral basket to Kim Jong Un and offered salutes to him.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was presented with silk banners by the heads of the delegations.
					
					 The participants were informed that floral baskets and congratulatory messages and letters were presented to Kim Jong Un by figures of political and social circles, representatives of the groups for the study of the Juche idea and organizations for solidarity and friendship and youth organizations of various countries of the world on the occasion of the Ninth Congress of the youth league.
					
					 They were also informed that floral baskets and congratulatory messages and letters were presented to the Central Committee of the youth league and its 9th Congress by figures of political, social and economic circles and youth organizations of various countries of the world.
					
					 The congress approved the following agenda items:
					
					1. "On review of work of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League"
					
					2. "On review of work of the Central Auditing Commission of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League"
					
					3. "On election of the central leadership organ of the youth league".
					
					4. "On renaming the youth league"
					
					5. "On revising the rules of the youth league"
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a report on the first agenda item.
					
					 The reporter said that the period from the 8th Congress of the League of Socialist Working Youth till today has been proud days when the youth league has been further cemented as the glorious youth league of the leaders and the Party thanks to the outstanding idea and leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and when the youth league has dynamically advanced in the van of the all-people advance for ushering in the new era of the Juche revolution, Songun revolution, braving the grim tempest of history.
					
					 The idea and politics of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on prioritizing the youth are the great idea and politics which created the glorious history of victory of the Korean revolution and the youth movement and built a youth power, the reporter said.
					
					 The WPK's idea and politics on prioritizing the youth are associated with the warm loving care, trust and noble outlook on the future of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Il Sung, after starting his revolutionary activities with the work with youth and exploring the path of the Korean revolution with the youth movement, founded the unique idea of prioritizing the youth on the basis of the Juche idea and clearly indicated the way to be followed by the youth movement in each period and at each stage of the developing revolution.
					
					 It was thanks to him that the position and role of the youth were put on the highest level as the vanguard and main unit responsible for the most difficult and labor-consuming field of the revolutionary struggle and social movement and backbone unit which would shoulder upon itself the destiny of the future for the first time in history, and this unfolded the new history of the Juche-oriented youth movement in which the young people dynamically push ahead with the revolutionary movement as vanguard.
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il who regarded it as the eternal strategic line of the WPK to prioritize the youth and put up the slogan "Love the Youth!" developed the youth league into the youth organization of the leader and trained the youth to be dependable vanguard fighters upholding the cause of the WPK in the van.
					
					 He handed over the torch of the revolution to the youth and led the youth league and the youth with his deep trust and loving care so that they might creditably perform their mission and duty as the eternal companions of the Party, reserve combat unit and detached force of the supreme commander.
					
					 The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un who  is carrying forward the leaders' noble intention of prioritizing and loving the youth, has made great efforts to prepare the youth league and the youth as reliable reserves, advancing group and wing of the Party.
					
					 The most important achievement made by the youth league in its work during the period under review is that it has developed into the youth league of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il both in name and reality.
					
					 Another achievement is that the youth league has fully prepared the young people as the young vanguard of the WPK, made sure that they created legendary stories about heroic youth in defending the country and in every worksite for building a socialist power and demonstrated the might of the youth power and prepared schoolchildren as dependable pillars of powerful Korea who are knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy.
					
					 The reporter called on the youth league organizations and the youth to perform their role as the reserves, advancing group and wing of the Party in the drive for accomplishing the socialist cause of Juche in hearty response to the important tasks set forth at the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 He said that it is an important duty facing the youth league and the young Koreans to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification as early as possible.
					
					 The youth league will steadily raise the position and influence of the Paektusan youth power, boost the solidarity and cooperation with world progressive youths and students aspiring after independence against imperialism and make a positive contribution to the development of the world youth and students movement and the realization of the world independence by firmly adhering to the Party's idea and principle of foreign policy, he added. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the congress.
					
					 Speakers said the youth league has grown to be the reserves, advancing group and wing of the Party remaining boundlessly loyal to the idea and cause of the leaders under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They renewed their determination to further enhance the fighting capability of organizations of the youth league and develop it into the Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's youth league forever.
					
					 A resolution on the first agenda item was adopted at the congress with the unanimous approval of the delegates.
					
					 The heads of the delegations of the Korean Youth League in Japan and the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China made congratulatory speeches.
					
					 A report on the second agenda item was made by Kim Ju Il, chairman of the Central Auditing Commission of the youth league.
					
					 A congratulatory group of the Korean Children's Union entered the venue of the congress.
					
					 It read out a congratulatory poem "We Offer Congratulations to Elder Brothers and Sisters of Young Vanguard" addressed to the 9th Congress of the youth league.
					
					 The third agenda item was discussed at the congress.
					
					 The Central Committee of the youth league was elected.
					
					 All candidates for members and alternate members of the C.C., the youth league who had been nominated were elected members and alternate members of the C.C., the youth league with the unanimous approval of the delegates.
					
					 The Central Auditing Commission of the youth league was elected.
					
					 All candidates for members of the commission who had been nominated were elected members of the commission with the unanimous approval of the delegates.
					
					 The contents of the resolution of the First Plenary Meeting of the 9th Central Committee of the youth league were published at the congress.
					
					 The Executive Committee of the Central Committee of the youth league was elected.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam was elected first secretary of the C.C., the youth league and Pak Chol Min, Jang Hyon Chol, Pae Chung Il, Kim Kyong Jun, Ri Song Ho, Jang Yong Gil, Jong Yong Won, Ham Kwang Chol and Ri Kum Chol were elected secretaries.
					
					 The organizing committee of the C.C., the youth league was formed.
					
					 Department directors of the C.C., the youth league and editor-in-chief of newspaper Chongnyon Jonwi were appointed.
					
					 The congress announced the results of election of chairman and vice-chairmen of the Central Auditing Commission of the youth league held at the First Plenary Meeting of the 9th Central Auditing Commission.
					
					 The fourth agenda item was discussed.
					
					 A resolution on renaming the youth league "the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League" was adopted with the unanimous approval of the delegates.
					
					 Kim Jong Un handed over the flag of the youth league.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam vowed to accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution, the cause of the Songun revolution down through generations under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, reflecting the loyalty of the members of the young vanguard across the country.
					
					 The fifth agenda item was discussed.
					
					 A resolution on revising the rules of the youth league was adopted with the unanimous approval of the delegates.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a speech at the congress.
					
					 The congress will go down in the history of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il youth movement as the congress of single-minded unity and congress of loyalty which powerfully demonstrated before the whole world the faith in certain victory and will of the five million members of the young vanguard to creditably discharge their duty as the reserves, advancing group and wing of the WPK in accomplishing the socialist cause of Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Speech at 9th Congress of Youth League
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Speech at 9th Congress of Youth League
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un made a speech at the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 Noting that he was satisfied with the successful work done by the congress, Kim Jong Un warmly congratulated the youth delegates to the congress.
					
					 He extended warm thanks and militant salute to all the young people across the country who have performed their honorable mission and duty as young vanguard of the Party while working miracles and performing feats at the posts for defending the country and worksites for building a socialist power.
					
					 He also extended warm compatriotic greetings to the Korean youth and students overseas including those in Japan and south Korea struggling for the independent reunification of the country and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 The 9th Congress of the youth league marks an epochal occasion in defending and glorifying forever the idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the youth movement and their exploits and developing the youth league into invincible vanguard ranks as required by the new era, he stressed.
					
					 The congress adopted a decision on renaming the youth league the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, he said, adding this marks a great event that laid a solid foundation for developing the youth league into that of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever and serves as the highest glory and greatest happiness for the youth league organizations and youth.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The congress is the one of loyalty which demonstrated the faith and will of young vanguard to carry forward and accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution under the guidance of the Party by inheriting the glorious history and tradition of struggle of the youth league, one of general advance which fully aroused the youth to the building of a socialist power and a historic one that laid a new milestone for the triumphant advance of the Juche-based youth movement and development of the youth league.
					
					 The seven decades-long history of the youth league is a brilliant one of victory of the great leaders' original idea of prioritizing the youth and their wise leadership and the one of ardent loyalty and patriotic devotion of the Korean youth to the Party, leader, country and its people.
					
					 He referred to the immortal feats performed by the great leaders for the youth movement.
					
					 The proud annals in which the Juche-based youth movement made a triumphant advance are associated with precious blood and sweat and heroic feats of the young people who fought for the Party, leader, country and its people at the risk of their lives, he said.
					
					 He indicated the tasks facing the youth league.
					
					 The youth league should model the whole league on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in order to successfully perform the sacred mission and duty it assumed before the times and revolution.
					
					 This is the matured requirement of the Korean revolution that reached a new high stage and the development of the youth movement and a militant banner to be held high by the youth league in the drive for accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 Youth league organizations and youth should become vanguard and shock brigade in building a socialist power.
					
					 "Let us fully display wisdom and courage of heroic youth in general charge for building socialist power!"--this is a militant slogan to be held high by the youth league and youth in the present times.
					
					 Young people should become death-defying corps in defending the socialist country, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Party.
					
					 They should bring about fresh miracles and innovations in all worksites for building a socialist power in bold attacking spirit and with the mettle of youth under the uplifted banner of self-development first principle.
					
					 They should become pace-setters and pioneers in building a scientific and technological power.
					
					 They should become creators of socialist civilization and vanguard in building a highly civilized nation.
					
					 They should wage a positive struggle for achieving the independent reunification of the country and realizing global independence.
					
					 The youth league should boost the anti-imperialist solidarity, friendship and unity with the world progressive youth and make positive contribution to the development of the world youth movement by adhering to the Party's idea and principle of foreign policy.
					
					 Kim Jong Un underscored the need for the youth league to strengthen its organizations and increase their militant function and role in every way in order to usher in the greatest heyday of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist youth movement.
					
					 Bright is the prospect of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League and the youth dashing ahead along the orbit of the Korean revolution indicated by the Party Central Committee and immensely rosy is the future of the Korean youth movement, he noted, calling for waging a dynamic struggle for the accomplishment of the socialist cause of Juche, the modeling of the youth league on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and bright future of the youth power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Reviews Seven Decades-long History of Youth League
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Reviews Seven Decades-long History of Youth League
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un reviewed the seven decades-long history of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League in a speech made at its 9th Congress.
					 He said that the above-said history is the one of the shining victory of President Kim Il Sung's  and leader Kim Jong Il's unique idea of prioritizing the youth and their wise leadership and the one of ardent loyalty and patriotic devotion of the Korean youth upholding the Party, the leader, the country and its people.
					
					 He said that the President, who gave origin to the youth movement in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution, set forth the idea of the youth movement of Juche and led the work with youth, showing deep trust and love for them.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il developed the youth league into the youth organization intensely loyal to the Party and leader with the line of prioritizing the youth and outstanding and experienced leadership and ushered in a new heyday of the youth movement by training the youth as reliable successors who give steady continuity to the lineage of Mt. Paektu and staunch fighters for carrying out the cause of the Juche revolution. He went on:
					
					 The great leaders set forth the idea of prioritizing the youth as the most important state affair and the strategic line of revolution in the whole period of the revolutionary leadership and wisely led them, perfectly settled the issue of youth for the first time in history and built a youth power without an equal in the world. This is the outstanding feat performed by the leaders.
					
					 The proud decades in which the youth movement of Juche has victoriously advanced are associated with the precious blood and sweat and heroic feats of youth who have waged a self-sacrificing struggle for the Party, leader, country and its people.
					
					 The youth of the first generation of the Korean revolution accomplished the historic cause of Korea's liberation by making long journeys for bloody battles against the Japanese imperialists despite snow storms with arms in their hands under the command of the President.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War the youth fought by unhesitatingly dedicating their youth and lives to the beloved country true to the leadership of the President, thus creating legendary stories about the victory of heroic Korea in the war and honorably defending the country from the imperialists' aggression.
					
					 In the difficult period of postwar rehabilitation and construction, too, they performed shining labor feats and dashed ahead at the speed of Chollima, performing heroic Korea's miracles of building a socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence, in a short span of time.
					
					 The youth defended the lineage of the Juche revolution and the socialist country at the cost of their lives by upholding the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il in the van during the grim period of stand-off with the imperialists and the U.S. which was decisive of the destiny of socialism, and ushered in the era of turn in building a socialist power by weathering difficulties and trials.
					
					 The youth have firmly defended the Party, leader and country and vigorously advanced the socialist construction in the sacred road of revolution generation after generation. Their heroic struggle and feats will go down in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea and that of the building of the youth power of Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Indicates Tasks and Ways for Youth League
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Indicates Tasks and Ways for Youth League
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un indicated the tasks and ways for the youth league in his speech made at the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 He said that the whole league should be modeled on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in order to successfully fulfill its sacred mission and duty it assumed before the era and the revolution.
					
					 He noted that modeling the youth league on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism means that it should hold the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal leaders and victoriously advance the youth movement of Juche, guided by the revolutionary ideology of the great leaders.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Modeling the youth league on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the requirement of the Korean revolution and development of the youth movement that have reached a fresh high level and the militant banner to be held high by the league in its struggle for accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 It is the path of the Korean revolution and fundamental guarantee for accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution to model the whole party and army and the youth league on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The youth league should uphold and preserve and add shine to the great leaders' idea of the youth movement and their leadership exploits under the unfurled banner of modeling the whole league on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and thoroughly establish the monolithic leadership system in the league.
					
					 It should firmly prepare all young people as genuine Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists by grasping the ideological and educational work among the youth as the main task.
					
					 The general goal of educating the youth is to train all the youth as genuine Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists.
					
					 The organizations of the youth league and youth should become vanguard and shock brigade in building a socialist power.
					
					 "Let us fully display wisdom and courage of heroic youth in general charge for building socialist power!" This is the militant slogan to be held high by the youth league and youth at present.
					
					 The youth should become death-defying corps in defending the socialist country true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Party.
					
					 They should steadily bring about fresh miracles and innovations in the bold attacking spirit and mettle of youth under the uplifted banner of the self-development-first principle in every worksite for building a socialist power.
					
					 They should become pace-setters and pioneers in building a scientific and technological power.
					
					 They should become creators of the socialist civilization and vanguard in building a highly civilized nation.
					
					 It is necessary to wage a dynamic struggle for establishing moral traits among the young people.
					
					 The youth should raise the hot wind of mass sports and defense sports to contribute to economic construction and national defense upbuilding with strong physical bodies and take the lead in turning the country into a fairyland of socialism.
					
					 They should proactively struggle to achieve the independent reunification of the country and global independence.
					
					 All the young Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should pool their will and intention and achieve solidarity and alliance in the patriotic struggle for reunification under the unfurled banner of national independence and great national unity and thus foil the obstructions of the U.S. imperialists and anti-reunification forces and pave a wide avenue to national reunification.
					
					 The youth league should boost anti-imperialist solidarity, friendship and unity with the world progressive youth and proactively contribute to the strengthening and development of the world youth movement by adhering to the Workers' Party of Korea's foreign policy idea and principle.
					
					 It should set an example and dynamically advance as vanguard in the struggle of the youth for independence and justice and thus fully demonstrate the might of the youth power of Juche.
					
					 Kim Jong Un underscored the need for the youth league to strengthen its organizations and increase their militant function and role in every way.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 It is necessary to strengthen the primary organizations of the youth league, the basic organizations and main combat units of the youth league.
					
					 The youth league should strengthen the organizations of the Korean Children's Union, successor to the league, and direct big efforts to educating its members well.
					
					 It is imperative to firmly build the ranks of officials of the youth league and further enhance their responsibility and role.
					
					 It is necessary to further improve the Party guidance over the work of the youth league.
					
					 The traits of prioritizing and loving the youth should prevail over the country.
					
					 The work with school youth and children is an important work related to the prospect of the Party, state and Korean-style socialism and it is the all-state, all-people work to train school youth and children.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Renamed Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Renamed Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League solemnly declared that the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was renamed the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, according to the decision at the congress adopted on Sunday.
					 The decision said:
					
					 Today when the greatest heyday is unfolding in the development of the Juche-oriented youth movement it is the unanimous aspiration and ardent desire of all youths and youth league officials throughout the country to rename the youth league after the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the august names of the sun, and accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution down through generations under the guidance of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, holding high the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, with profound insight into the realistic requirement of the Korean revolution and the Juche-oriented youth movement and the unanimous desire and will of the five million members of the young vanguard, made sure that the youth league was renamed Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League at its 9th congress, the highest honor and deepest trust shown for the youth.
					
					 This reflects the noble intention of Kim Jong Un to see the youth league and the youth creditably fulfilling their mission and duty as reliable reserves, advancing group and wing of the Party in the struggle for hastening the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution under the unfurled banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Torchlight Gala Marks 9th Congress of Youth League
articles.content:
Torchlight Gala Marks 9th Congress of Youth League
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A torchlight gala of members of the youth vanguard "Let the Youth Power March forward Following the Party!" was held with splendor at the May Day Stadium on Sunday to mark the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 When Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, appeared at the tribune of honor, all participants enthusiastically welcomed him, extending the highest glory and warmest thanks to him.
					
					 He waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the masses, extending warm congratulations and militant salute to the young vanguard.
					
					 Among the spectators were Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam and others, the participants of the 9th congress and youth and students and working people in Pyongyang, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies, members of the military attaches corps here and foreign guests were present there on invitation.
					
					 Amid the playing of the song "Baton of Revolution," three youths and students lit the flame holder, reflecting the pledge made by the 5 million members of the youth vanguard.
					
					 When open cars carrying flags bearing the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il entered the venue of the gala, escorted by members of the young vanguard, the participants broke into cheers of "hurrah!" and the august names of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and the letters "Youth league of eternal sun" were projected.
					
					 The letters "August 28, 1927," "January 17, 1946" and "January 19, 1996" and Mt. Paektu showing the exploits of the peerlessly great men to go down in the history of the Korean youth movement were shown by change of torch formations.
					
					 The letters "Hanbyol", "Shining Star" and "Young Vanguard" were depicted to represent the will of the youth to fully demonstrate the might of the youth power of Mt. Paektu while absolutely trusting and following Marshal Kim Jong Un only just as the passionate youths of the preceding generations devotedly defended the great leaders, holding them in high esteem as the center of the leadership and unity.
					
					 Youth and students truthfully represented with torchlight the fact that the loving care being shown by the mother Party to make the young people ones envied by the world, true to the noble intention of the leaders, is just the one shown by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Formations and rhythms of torch holders were presented to depict the revolutionary mettle of the youths to steadily work miracles and make uninterrupted advance by creating the Mallima speed in the 200-day campaign of loyalty to make a breakthrough in carrying out the 5-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 Ranks of torch holders depicted the letters "Lineage of Mt. Paektu", "Reserves", "Advancing Group", "Wing" and "Safeguarding of Leader."
					
					 Letters "May torchlight of youth power last forever!" were depicted.
					
					 When the gala was over, the participants broke into cheers of "hurrah!" again.
					
					 Kim Jong Un waved back to the young vanguard.
					
					 He extended thanks to all the performers, creators, instructors and officials, saying with high appreciation that the torch gala of the young vanguard is the highest in organizational ability, discipline and artistry.
					
					 The newly created song "Hymn of Youth" was played and youth and students presented dance.
					
					 Fireworks were displayed to gorgeously decorate the nocturnal sky above the stadium.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to 9th Congress of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League from Foreign Organizations, Personages
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to 9th Congress of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League from Foreign Organizations, Personages
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent to the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League by groups for the study of Juche idea, international organizations and friendship organizations and personages. 
					 Among them were the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Kim Il Sung Kindergarten, Kim Jong Il Kindergarten and Kim Jong Suk Kindergarten of Mongolia, Association of Mongolian Students who Studied in the DPRK, Organization of Youth and Students for the Study of Juche Idea in Karachi, Pakistan, Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, the Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Slovenian Youth Party, Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, Korean Friendship Association, Asia-Pacific regional, Arab regional, Oceanian regional, Indonesian and Ecuadorian preparatory committees for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, president of the Women's International Democratic Federation and the president of the World Federation of Democratic Youth.

articles.title: Youth Determined to Demonstrate Might of Youth Power
articles.content:
Youth Determined to Demonstrate Might of Youth Power
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving an important speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, five million members of the league are filled with determination to fully demonstrate the might of a youth power.  
					 Pak Ryong Chol, a battalion commander of the High-Speed Youth Shock Brigade participating in the construction of Ryomyong Street, told KCNA:
					
					 In his speech, Kim Jong Un said that it is a great felicity for the Workers' Party of Korea and the pride of the DPRK to have such reliable big ranks of young people and herein lies the mightiness of our dignified country and its rosy future. 
					
					 Our youth are blessed with having held in high esteem through generations the peerlessly great men who have always put forward young people as a pride representing the country's mightiness and future. 
					
					 The DPRK will as ever remain powerful and its future rosy as long as it is led by Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the great leaders' idea of prioritizing the youth and their leadership exploits.
					
					 Mok Ryon, a teacher of the Kang Pan Sok Senior Secondary School who participated in the torchlight gala held in the presence of supreme leader Kim Jong Un to mark the 9th congress, said:
					
					 He extended warm greetings to all the young people across the country at the historic congress. After watching the torchlight gala, he sent thanks to all its performers, saying with high appreciation that the torch gala of the young vanguard is the highest in organizational ability, discipline and artistry.
					
					 Thanks to his warm loving care for young people, our youth could form the big ranks of invincible fighters rallied close around the Party.
					
					 It is my firm determination to train all my students for genuine members of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League who will display wisdom and courage of heroic youth in general charge for building socialist power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Namibian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Namibian President
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message of greeting from Hage Geingob, president of the Republic of Namibia, on Aug. 11.
					 The president in the message extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the government and people of the DPRK on the founding anniversary of the DPRK, Sept. 9, 2016 on behalf of the government and people of Namibia and on his own behalf.
					
					 The message expressed very pleasure over the fact that the excellent diplomatic relations between the governments and peoples of the two countries continue to exist and welcomed it.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and success in his work of leading the Korean people to steady prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Messages, Letters from Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Messages, Letters from Different Countries
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters from different countries on the 63rd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Among them were the chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, general secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, general secretary and the international secretary of the New Communist Party of Yugoslavia, vice-chairman and a secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, co-chairman of the  Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, president of the  Women's International Democratic Federation and high-ranking officials of political, social, military and economic circles of Russia, China, Nepal, India, Japan, Germany, Bulgaria, Belarus, Switzerland, Slovenia, France, UK, Benin, Sierra Leon, Senegal, Tanzania, Jamaica, Panama, Peru and Ecuador and representatives of international organizations,  groups for the study of the Juche idea and organizations for Korea's reunification and friendship. 
					
					 They expressed firm belief that only victory and glory will be set in store for the Korean people advancing upholding the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un with loyalty.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, returned home Monday. It participated in the 7th Congress of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola and visited the DR Congo, the Republic of Angola, the Republic of Namibia, and the Republic of South Africa.

articles.title: Delegation of Myanmar Medical Research Institute Pays Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Russian Body Discloses Purpose of Ulji Freedom Guardian
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK made public a statement on August 22, denouncing Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill being staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group of traitors.
					 The U.S. and south Korea are perpetrating military provocations on the Korean peninsula, rendering the regional situation extremely tense, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The aim of the joint drill is to launch a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, genuine independent country for people.
					
					 The Korean people are getting more firmly united around supreme leader Kim Jong Un despite the intensified aggression and pressure by outsiders.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the escalated moves of provocateurs for aggression on the DPRK would make them face stronger counteraction.
					
					 We appeal to peace-loving people to raise their voices critical of the reckless military provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people would firmly protect the country's sovereignty and national dignity under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Secretary General of International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies Arrives
articles.content:
Secretary General of International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies Arrives
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Sy El Hadji Amadou Gueye, secretary general of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, and his party arrived here Monday.

articles.title: National Festival of Science and Technology Opens
articles.content:
National Festival of Science and Technology Opens
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The 31st national festival of science and technology opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex Monday.
					 The festival will be divided into more than 30 panels under the theme of the development of the latest technology and integration of science, technology and economy. 
					
					 There will be the display and presentation of scientific and technological achievements and services for the exchange of new technology and new goods.
					
					 Attending the festival are scientists, technicians, three-revolution team members and workers of commissions, ministries, national institutions, universities and over 300 units who were selected at provincial (municipal) scientific and technological festivals. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Tok Hun, vice-premier, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned and other people.

articles.title: 12th Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair to Be Held
articles.content:
12th Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair to Be Held
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The 12th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair will take place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House from September 5 to 8.
					 More than 280 companies will take part in the fair.
					
					 They are the companies of the DPRK, Malaysia, Mongolia, Singapore, China, Thailand, Iran, Indonesia, Vietnam, Germany, Russia, Italy, Cuba, New Zealand, Australia and Taipei of China.
					
					 Those companies will show their electronic products, machines, metal products, building materials, vehicles, medicine, agricultural products and light industrial goods.

articles.title: Electric-power Production on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Electric-power Production on Increase in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Electric-power production is on the steady increase at hydro-power stations in the DPRK.
					 According to data available at the Ministry of Electric Power Industry, hydro-power stations across the country have fulfilled their production quotas over 107 percent on a daily average in the on-going 200-day campaign. 
					
					 Taking the lead in power production are Thaechon, Hochongang, Jangjingang, Jangjagang, Kanggye Youth, Sodusu and Taedonggang power stations.
					
					 In the DPRK, hydro-power stations play a big role in power production.

articles.title: U.S. Should Face up to Reality: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Should Face up to Reality: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. war racket against the DPRK has reached an extremely risky phase.
					The U.S. kicked off the largest-ever Ulji Freedom Guardian joint war exercise in league with the south Korean puppet forces despite the strong opposition of all Koreans and the world public.
					
					The war rehearsal is a serious challenge to the efforts for peace and stability in the region as it is a military provocation aimed at a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, to all intents and purposes.
					
					The U.S. desperate bid to cover up its belligerent and risky nature of the war drumbeats will only betray its despicable colors as a harasser of the regional peace and stability.
					
					It was well illustrated by the strong voices raised by the international community critical of the war racket when it was kicked off.
					
					A Russian expert asserted that regime change and collapse of the DPRK seems to be set by the masterminds of the war drill as its general objective. He warned such war drumbeats may screw up tensions with an accidental outbreak of conflict and that premeditated escalation of military actions may lead to the second Korean war.
					
					Xinhua also commented that the war drill simulating an all-out attack on the DPRK will cause Pyongyang's more offensive stance and worsen the already fragile and instable situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					Claiming the U.S. should think twice about the drill with south Korea, experts of the U.S. said north Korea would not abandon its present nuclear arsenal. It turns out, in the long run, that north Korea threatens the U.S. as the latter threatens the former, they added.
					
					Many media and experts in the world are advising the U.S. to halt foolhardy sanctions and joint war drills and drop its wild dream of confrontation.
					
					As claimed by the international community, the on-going war rehearsal is an aggressive and offensive one aimed at "toppling the social system" of the DPRK. Its danger and gravity are that it may further increase the possibility of armed clash in the region and cause a disastrous nuclear war, in particular.
					
					It is the unanimous conclusion drawn by the public that the U.S. should be held wholly accountable if situation turns out worse.
					
					This is also a warning to the U.S. that it has to behave with prudence, not running riot being ignorant of the trend of the times.
					
					The service personnel and people of the DPRK have solemnly declared that they are capable of dealing a preemptive nuclear strike at the nuclear war maniacs attempting to deprive them of the cradle of their life and bring down their social system that represents their destiny.
					
					The preemptive strike will be a merciless, deadly and final one.
					
					The U.S. might not have imagined its mainland, on which no bomb has so far been dropped, reducing to ashes in a moment due to its provocation during the nuclear war drill on foreign soil.
					
					Lamentation and regret over destruction always come too late.
					
					The world-startling rapid development of the nuclear force of the DPRK physically guarantees its will and practice.
					
					Now is just the time for the U.S. to face up to the reality and behave with discretion.
					
					The U.S. persistent policy hostile to the DPRK being manifested in the nuclear war drills and increase of factors of nuclear threat will only precipitate the former's self-destruction, while making the DPRK steadily bolster its nuclear attack capability.

articles.title: U.S. Bio-Chemical Warfare Is Unpardonable Challenge to Korean People's Right to Existence: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Bio-Chemical Warfare Is Unpardonable Challenge to Korean People's Right to Existence: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, a website of Mexico disclosed the fact that the U.S. plans to produce chemical weapons in south Korea under the "Jupiter Operation" aimed to massively kill inhabitants in north Korea and to introduce materials for producing chemical weapons in Pusan Port from next year to be specific. The construction of secret laboratories is under way for producing chemical weapons.
					 The Venezuelan paper Vea cited a report by the UK paper Daily Star, saying that the U.S. is preparing the mass killing by use of bio-chemical weapons against the inhabitants of the DPRK for the mere reason that north Korea is the one standing against it.
					
					 Minju Joson Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the U.S. criminal attempt to use at will mass destruction weapons whose use is banned by international law to realize its criminal purpose for stifling the DPRK has become the targets of curse and denunciation by mankind.
					
					 The U.S. bio-chemical warfare aimed to exterminate the Korean nation sparks off the resentment of the service personnel and people of the DPRK as an unpardonable challenge to the Korean nation's right to existence.
					
					 It is long time ago that the dirty mask of the U.S. imperialists styling themselves American "gentlemen" while trumpeting about "peace" and "humanitarianism" was put off before the world.
					
					 The U.S. is the hideous murder who would not bother obliterating mankind in a bid to attain its egotistical interests.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the sinister moves of the U.S. imperialists who commit all kinds of evils against mankind.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will frustrate the U.S. attempt with strong military preemptive attack before it commits crimes which may bring horrible consequences to the Korean nation.
					
					 If the U.S is afraid of its miserable and final end, it should make public the background of all such crimes as "Jupiter Operation", make an apology before the Korean nation and international community and stop at once the reckless attempt at mass killing.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails South Korean Regime's Disgraceful Fuss
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails South Korean Regime's Disgraceful Fuss
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Obama is deceptively blustering that he would declare "no-first use of nuclear weapons".
					 Upset by this, the south Korean puppet regime stubbornly asked the U.S. not to give up the principle of preemptive nuclear attack and sent the American master a message carrying its stand opposed to "no-first use of nuclear weapons" in July to the effect that it might give an adverse signal of shrinking nuclear deterrence to the north which is uninterruptedly developing nuclear weapons and missiles. 
					
					 The south Korean regime is making a fuss to lobby the White House not to declare "no-first use of nuclear weapons".
					
					 Minju Joson on Monday says in a commentary that the south Korean regime's fuss over the U.S. deceptive farce triggers off resentment of the Koreans.
					
					 "No-first use of nuclear weapons" is a fraud orchestrated by Obama to deceive the world people as it is just a replica of the initiative for the "world without nuclear weapons" made by him early in his tenure, the commentary says, and continues:
					
					 It is precisely the other side of a declaration of preemptive use of nuclear weapons, a declaration of a nuclear war with criminal intention to mount surprise nuclear attack upon the sovereign states which disobey the U.S.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors have failed to see through this strategic point of the U.S. farce and clutched at the U.S. sleeves, worrying that they may be left outside the U.S. nuclear umbrella. This is a tragicomedy and political cartoon betraying the despicable nature of the south Korean puppet group as colonial stooges and nuclear war servants.
					
					 Though the Park group talk volumes about the "north's nuclear threat and provocation" and follow the U.S. scenario for preemptive nuclear strike at the north, this will precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Deserved to Be Punished
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Deserved to Be Punished
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, puppet chief executive of south Korea, let loose a string of reckless remarks hurting the DPRK in a bid to instigate the confrontation and tension between the north and the south.
					 Taken aback by the news of the DPRK's successful SLBM test-fire on August 24, Park rushed to a frontline unit of the puppet army and cried out for a "resolute counteraction", vociferating that "the north launched the SLBM at dawn" and "the nuclear and missile threats are coming from the north hour by hour".
					
					 In this regard, Prof. and Dr. Ko Chol Hun, director of the DPRK Academy of Social Sciences who is also a candidate academician, said such remarks can be made only by a confrontation maniac seized with hostility toward the fellow countrymen.
					
					 He added:
					
					 Her invectives are nothing but a trash the provokers made, out of feeling uneasy with their "Ulji Freedom Guardian" joint military exercises against the DPRK in collusion with the outsiders.
					
					 Involved in the on-going exercises are a large number of U.S. imperialist aggression troops and the south Korean puppet army as well as the puppet administrative machineries and military and civic enterprises in south Korea.
					
					 Nevertheless, Park is making vituperations like "resolute counteraction" to justify the reckless joint military exercises, which reminds everyone of "a thief crying for a thief".
					
					 Such behavior can not be construed otherwise than a foolish act committed only by a goose devoid of elementary judgment of the situation.
					
					 Park will be keenly aware of what disastrous consequences to be entailed by wagging her tongue.

articles.title: Victims of Sexual Slavery Blast S. Korean Regime's Humiliating Measure
articles.content:
Victims of Sexual Slavery Blast S. Korean Regime's Humiliating Measure
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Pok Dong and Kil Won Ok, victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, on Aug. 26 held a press conference in Mapho District, Seoul in which they denounced the puppet regime for closing its eyes to Japan's past crimes by offering the victims a paltry amount of money, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The south Korean regime's reception of rewards for the victims for sexual slavery from Japan is an act of selling off the victims, they said.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the authorities demanded the families of the victims help the implementation of the humiliating "agreement", they said that only those who have never experienced sufferings can demand them get such money.
					
					 They renewed their will to fight it out to force Japan to pay a very high price for its past crimes no matter how much money the regime may give to them.

articles.title: Russian Body Discloses Purpose of Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
Russian Body Discloses Purpose of Ulji Freedom Guardian
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK made public a statement on August 22, denouncing Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill being staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group of traitors.
					 The U.S. and south Korea are perpetrating military provocations on the Korean peninsula, rendering the regional situation extremely tense, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The aim of the joint drill is to launch a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, genuine independent country for people.
					
					 The Korean people are getting more firmly united around supreme leader Kim Jong Un despite the intensified aggression and pressure by outsiders.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the escalated moves of provocateurs for aggression on the DPRK would make them face stronger counteraction.
					
					 We appeal to peace-loving people to raise their voices critical of the reckless military provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people would firmly protect the country's sovereignty and national dignity under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: DPRK Is Sure to Win: Russian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Is Sure to Win: Russian Organization
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Russian institute for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Aug. 22 posted on its website an article titled "World progressive peoples should unite to protect international justice".
					 The article said the human peace and safety is being seriously threatened by the imperialists' interference and military invasion of sovereign states on the international arena today, adding:
					
					 Recently, the imperialists' war threats are getting more undisguised on the Korean peninsula and in other regions.
					
					 The imperialists have set independent countries as a target of invasion and run amuck to strangle those countries by force.
					
					 The international community shouldn't allow the imperialists to infringe upon the sovereignty of those countries.
					
					 The progressive countries should struggle to reject old international order and to establish fresh one.
					
					 If one is weak, one cannot defend justice nor can escape from slavery and death.
					
					 No one can overwhelm the might of the people who aspire after independence.
					
					 The DPRK, a nuclear weapons state, which aspires after justice and independence, is sure to win.

articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for KPA General Staff Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
Statement of Spokesman for KPA General Staff Supported by British Organizations
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The British preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on August 22 in support of the statement of a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said that Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces is a provocative one for a war of aggression targeting the DPRK, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The KPA General Staff in the statement of its spokesman termed the rehearsal a clear manifestation of a sinister scenario to deprive the Korean people of the cradle of their life by force of arms and bring down the socialist system, their destiny, and thus bring miserable fate of colonial slavery to all the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 This is a correct and clear analysis of the saber-rattling.
					
					 The DPRK is quite different from Iraq or Libya.
					
					 The DPRK clarified its strong and resolute stand on the joint military drill.
					
					 The joint statement fully supported the militant and revolutionary stand of the DPRK against imperialism.
					
					 The U.S. should stop the military maneuvers if it thinks about what is beneficial to it, it stressed.

articles.title: Syrian Figure Praises Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Leadership Exploits
articles.content:
Syrian Figure Praises Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Leadership Exploits
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Saber Ballul, head of department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus in Syria, made public a statement on Aug. 23 on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 He said that Aug. 25 was a historic day when HE Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership, adding:
					
					 He strengthened the country's defense capabilities through his Songun leadership and thus firmly protected the gains of revolution from the war moves of outside forces.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun Politics, the DPRK could have powerful means of attack and defense to stand up to any invasion by the outside forces.
					
					 In particular, the DPRK has access to a strong nuclear deterrent against the U.S. nuclear threats.
					
					 The accuracy and vitality of the Songun Politics initiated by Kim Jong Il have been clearly demonstrated in today's reality.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand the Korean people's power and will.
					
					 The Korean people are indomitable ones who hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as their eternal leaders and keep the Juche idea, Songun idea as their faith.

articles.title: Danish Body Condemns U.S.-S. Korean Joint Military Drill
articles.content:
Danish Body Condemns U.S.-S. Korean Joint Military Drill
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association released a statement on August 23 in denunciation of the joint military drill now underway by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					 Urging the U.S. to stop at once Ulji Freedom Guardian, the statement said:
					
					 The U.S.-led joint military drill started in south Korea despite the warning of the DPRK.
					
					 The rehearsal with huge aggression forces including huge U.S. and south Korean forces and those of other satellite countries involved is further deteriorating the tense situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is a dangerous saber-rattling aimed to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK as the U.S. hurled ultra-modern nuclear strike means into it.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is getting more serious as the days go by.
					
					 The drill, in particular, is being staged under the unprecedentedly instable situation where the U.S. introduced various nuclear strategic bombers, THAAD and other strategic assets into the Korean peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers should drop their foolish dream to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was published in booklet by Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Aug. 24 on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Korean Photo, Book, Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Peru
articles.content:
Korean Photo, Book, Handicraft Exhibition Opens in Peru
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A DPRK photo, book and handicraft exhibition opened with due ceremony in Lima City, Peru on Aug. 22 on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership and the 68th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venue were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were also their works, books on their greatness, photos and books introducing the Korean army and people ushering in a golden age in building a socialist power, handicraft showing excellent traditions and brilliant culture of the Korean nation.
					
					 It was followed by a film show at which the Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" was shown.
					
					 The exhibition goes on till Sep. 10.

articles.title: Day of Songun of DPRK Marked in Myanmar, Poland
articles.content:
Day of Songun of DPRK Marked in Myanmar, Poland
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Celebrations and film shows were held in Myanmar and Poland on Aug. 23 and 24 on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Korean films introducing the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the Rungna People's Pleasure Park, etc. were shown at the film shows.
					
					 The vice-director of the Yangon Institute for Sports and Physical Exercise of Myanmar said that HE Kim Jong Il remarkably strengthened the country's defense capabilities with his original Songun politics and made immortal contributions to the global peace and safety, adding that the Korean people and world progressive humankind boundlessly respect him.
					
					 The chief of the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for reliably defending the country's sovereignty and dignity by achieving one victory after another in an acute politico-military standoff with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 They said the DPRK is a military power with a powerful nuclear deterrent and firmly protecting the regional peace and security by Songun, expressing the belief that the Korean people would register bigger successes in building a socialist power under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Se efectua con solemnidad el IX Congreso de Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Se efectua con solemnidad el IX Congreso de Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 27 y 28 con solemnidad en esta capital el IX Congreso de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung. 
					Al conclave asistio Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam y otros, asi como los delegados seleccionados en las conferencias central y locales de la organizacion juvenil.
					
					Participaron en calidad de observadores los funcionarios de los organismos partidistas, administrativos y de las fuerzas armadas y de los dominios relacionados con la educacion para los jovenes y ninos escolares, las delegaciones de la Union de Jovenes Coreanos en Japon y la Asociacion de Jovenes Coreanos Residentes en China.
					
					El Mariscal recibio un cesto de flores y el saludo de los delegados juveniles. 
					
					Tambien, acogio las banderas congratulatorias de los jefes de las delegaciones de la Union de Jovenes Coreanos en Japon y la Asociacion de Jovenes Coreanos Residentes en China. 
					
					En el congreso se presentaron los cestos de flores y los mensajes y cartas de felicitacion enviados al Presidente Kim Jong Un por las personalidades de circulos politico y social, los delegados de organizaciones de estudio de la idea Juche y entidades de solidaridad y amistad, y las organizaciones juveniles de varios paises del mundo con motivo del IX Congreso de la UJS. 
					
					Tambien, se dieron a conocer los cestos de flores y los mensajes y cartas de felicitacion enviados al Comite Central de la UJS y al IX Congreso de la UJS por las personalidades de circulos politico, social y economico y las organizaciones juveniles de muchos paises. 
					
					El conclave aprobo las siguientes agendas:
					
					1. Sobre el balance de las labores del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung
					
					2. Sobre el balance de las labores de la Comision Central Revisora de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung 
					
					3. Sobre la eleccion del organo directivo central de la Union de la Juventud 
					
					4. Sobre la nueva denominacion de la Union de la Juventud 
					
					5. Sobre la enmienda del estatuto de la Union de la Juventud
					
					El informe sobre la primera agenda estuvo a cargo de Jon Yong Nam, primer secretario del Comite Central de la UJS. 
					
					El informante dijo:
					
					El periodo que data del VIII Congreso de la Union de la Juventud Trabajadora Socialista fue los dias orgullosos en que bajo la destacada idea y direccion de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu, la Union de la Juventud fue consolidada mas firmemente como organizacion del lider y del partido y ha venido avanzando con pasos firmes al frente de la marcha de todo el pueblo para abrir nueva epoca de la revolucion del Juche, la del Songun, superando severas tempestades de la historia. 
					
					La idea y la politica del PTC de dar importancia a los jovenes son la gran idea y politica que crearon la gloriosa historia triunfal de la revolucion y el movimiento juvenil de Corea y construyeron la potencia de la juventud.
					
					Ellas contienen el caliente amor y confianza a los jovenes y la noble concepcion del futuro de los grandes Lideres antecesores y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien inicio con la labor juvenil sus actividades revolucionarias y forjo con el movimiento juvenil el camino a seguir por la revolucion coreana, creo la original idea de dar importancia a la juventud basandose en la idea Juche e ilumino en cada epoca y etapa del desarrollo de la revolucion el camino del movimiento juvenil.
					
					Gracias al Presidente, la posicion y el papel de los jovenes llegaron al plano alto como unidad vanguardista y grueso que se encargan de los dominios mas dificiles en la lucha revolucionaria y el movimiento social y como unidad de pilares que se responsabilizan del destino del futuro, y se abrio la nueva historia del autoctono movimiento juvenil en que los jovenes impulsan energicamente el movimiento revolucionario siendo vanguardistas.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il presento la idea de dar importancia a los jovenes como eterna linea estrategica del PTC y dio la consigna "!Amen a los Jovenes!". Y fortalecio la union juvenil como organizacion del lider y formo a los jovenes como fidedignos vanguardistas que sostienen al frente la causa del PTC.
					
					Entrego a los jovenes la antorcha de la revolucion y condujo con gran confianza y amor para que la union juvenil y los jovenes cumplieran excelentemente la mision y el deber de eternos acompanantes del partido, unidad combativa de reserva y tropa especial del Comandante Supremo.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quien continua el noble proposito de los grandes Lideres antecesores de dar importancia y apreciar a los jovenes, dedica grandes esfuerzos por formar firmemente a los jovenes y su organizacion como fidedigna unidad de reserva, la patrulla y de flanco del PTC.
					
					El exito mas importante alcanzado en las labores de la UJS en el periodo de revision general es que esta organizacion juvenil se ha fortalecido como la de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Otro exito es que la UJS formo firmemente a los jovenes como vanguardistas juveniles del PTC, les impulso a manifestar el poderio de la potencia de la juventud creando los mitos de los jovenes heroes en la defensa de la patria y en los campos de construccion de una potencia socialista, y preparo a los ninos escolares como fidedignos continuadores de Corea en prosperidad dotados de ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud. 
					
					En acato a las tareas programaticas presentadas en el VII Congreso del PTC, las organizaciones de la UJS y los jovenes deben desempenar el papel de destacamento de reserva, patrulla y de flanco del Partido en la lucha por llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista del Juche. 
					
					Cumplir lo mas pronto posible la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria es un importante deber que incumbe a la UJS y la juventud coreana. 
					
					La UJS tiene que materializar estrictamente el ideal y los principios del PTC en materia de la politica exterior para asi elevar constantemente la posicion y la influencia de la potencia juvenil del monte Paektu, fortalecer la unidad y cooperacion con los jovenes y estudiantes progresistas del mundo aspirantes a la independencia antiimperialista y contribuir activamente al desarrollo del movimiento mundial de la juventud y estudiantes y al cumplimiento de la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero. 
					
					Luego, hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores mencionaron que bajo la sabia direccion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu, la UJS ha crecido como destacamento de reserva, patrulla y de flanco del Partido infinitamente fiel a la idea y causa de lider. 
					
					Ellos expresaron las decisiones de elevar mas la capacidad combativa de las organizaciones de la UJS y desarrollarla como eterna organizacion juvenil de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					En el conclave fue aprobada por unanimidad la resolucion sobre la primera agenda. 
					
					Los jefes de las delegaciones de la Union de Jovenes Coreanos en Japon y la Asociacion de Jovenes Coreanos Residentes en China pronunciaron las palabras de felicitacion. 
					
					El presidente de la Comision Central Revisora de la UJS, Kim Ju Il, presento el informe sobre la segunda agenda. 
					
					El grupo de felicitacion de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea entro en la sede del conclave y recito la poesia de felicitacion "Felicidades a los vanguardistas juveniles". 
					
					El Congreso discutio la tercera agenda. 
					
					Se eligio el Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Todos los candidatos recomendados fueron electos por la aprobacion unanime como miembros y miembros suplentes del CC de la UJS. 
					
					En la eleccion de la Comision Central Revisora de la UJS, todos los candidatos recomendados fueron electos por unanimidad como miembros de la Comision Central Revisora de la UJS. 
					
					El Congreso dio a conocer la resolucion de la primera sesion plenaria del IX periodo del CC de la UJS. 
					
					Fue electa la Comision Ejecutiva del CC de la UJS.
					
					Fueron elegidos Jon Yong Nam como primer secretario del CC del PTC, y Pak Chol Min, Jang Hyon Chol, Pae Chung Il, Kim Kyong Jun, Ri Song Ho, Jang Yong Gil, Jong Yong Won, Ham Kwang Chol y Ri Kum Chol como secretarios del CC de la UJS. 
					
					Se constituyo la Comision Organizativa del CC de la UJS. 
					
					Fueron nombrados los jefes de departamento del CC de la UJS y el editor jefe de la Editora del Periodico Chongnyon Jonwi. 
					
					Fue publicado el resultado de eleccion de presidente y vicepresidentes de la Comision Central Revisora de la UJS, efectuado en la primera sesion plenaria del IX periodo de la Comision Central Revisora de la UJS. 
					
					Fue discutida la cuarta agenda.
					
					Fue aprobada por unanimidad la resolucion sobre el cambio del nombre de la UJS por la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista - Kimjongilista. 
					
					El Presidente Kim Jong Un entrego personalmente la bandera de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista - Kimjongilista.
					
					Reflejando el sentimiento de fidelidad de todos los vanguardistas juveniles del pais, el primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud, Jon Yong Nam, hizo juramento de cumplir generacion tras generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, bajo la orientacion de Kim Jong Un. 
					
					En el congreso fue debatida la quinta agenda.
					
					La resolucion sobre la enmienda del estatuto de la Union de la Juventud fue aprobada por unanimidad. 
					
					El Presidente Kim Jong Un pronuncio discurso. 
					
					El IX Congreso de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung se registrara en la historia del movimiento juvenil Kim Il Sung - Kim Jong Il como conclave de unidad monolitica y de fidelidad que manifesto a todo el mundo la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de 5 millones de vanguardistas juveniles de cumplir con la mision de destacamento de reserva, patrulla y de flanco del PTC en llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista del Juche.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso en IX Congreso de la UJS
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso en IX Congreso de la UJS
Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un pronuncio un discurso en el IX Congreso de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.
					Expreso la satisfaccion de que el IX Congreso de la UJS realiza con exito su trabajo y felicito fervientemente a los delegados juveniles al Congreso.
					
					Envio el calido agradecimiento y saludo combativo a los jovenes de todo el pais, quienes cumplen su mision y obligacion orgullosas de la vanguardia juvenil del partido creando los milagros y meritos en los puestos de defensa de la patria y en todos los campos de construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					Transmitio el cordial saludo a los jovenes coreanos residentes en ultramar incluyendo los residentes en Japon y a los surcoreanos que luchan por la reunificacion independiente de la patria y la prosperidad de la nacion.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que el IX Congreso de la UJS sirve de un motivo trascendental en defender y glorificar eternamente la idea del movimiento juvenil y las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y en fortalecer la Union de la Juventud como destacamento vanguardista invicto de acuerdo con la demanda de la nueva epoca, y continuo:
					
					En el Congreso se adopto la resolucion sobre el cambio del nombre de la UJS por la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista, lo cual deviene un acontecimiento especial para fortalecer y desarrollar la Union de la Juventud como eterna organizacion juvenil del Presidente y el Dirigente, y constituye la infinita gloria y felicidad de las organizaciones de la Union de la Juventud y sus miembros.
					
					El IX Congreso de la UJS es un conclave de fidelidad que manifiesta la conviccion y voluntad de los vanguardias juveniles de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del Partido continuando la gloriosa historia y las tradiciones de lucha de la Union de la Juventud, la conferencia de marcha general que llamo energicamente a los jovenes a la gran campana de construccion de la potencia socialista y el congreso historico que prepara nuevo jalon en el avance victorioso del autoctono movimiento juvenil y en la consolidacion de la Union de la Juventud.
					
					Los 70 anos de la Union de la Juventud son la historia de la victoria de la original idea de dar importancia a la juventud y la sabia direccion de los grandes Lideres y la registrada por la fidelidad y abnegacion patriotica de los jovenes coreanos que  apoyan el partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					En las decadas orgullosas en que avanzo victoriosamente el movimiento juvenil del Juche, estan conservados la sangre y el sudor valioso y los meritos heroicos de los jovenes que lucharon con sacrificio por el partido y el lider y por la patria y el pueblo.
					
					El Mariscal presento a la Union de la Juventud las tareas siguientes:
					
					Hay que transformar toda la Union de la Juventud segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo para cumplir con exito su obligacion y mision sagradas asumidas ante la epoca y la revolucion.
					
					La transformacion de la Union de la Juventud segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo constituye la demanda propicia del desarrollo de nuestra revolucion y el movimiento juvenil que han llegado a una nueva etapa elevada y la bandera combativa a ser enarbolada por la organizacion juvenil en la lucha por el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Las organizaciones de la Union de la Juventud y sus miembros deben ser vanguardias y brigada de choque en la construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					"!Ostentemos sin reservas la inteligencia y valentia de la juventud heroina en la ofensiva general para la construccion de la potencia socialista!", esto es la consigna combativa que tienen que mantener en la actualidad la Union de la Juventud y sus miembros.
					
					Los jovenes deben apoyar con fidelidad la direccion del Partido sobre la revolucion Songun y ser el peloton suicida en la campana de defensa de la patria socialista.
					
					Deben enarbolar la bandera de dar prioridad al espiritu de autofortalecimiento en todos los campos de construccion de la potencia socialista y crear sin cesar nuevos milagros e innovaciones con el valiente espiritu de ofensiva y el impetu de la juventud.
					
					Deben ser precursores y exploradores en la construccion de la potencia cientifico-tecnica.
					
					Deben ser creadores de la civilizacion socialista y vanguardistas de la construccion la potencia civilizada.
					
					Hay que luchar con dinamismo para realizar la reunificacion independiente de la patria y la independencia mundial.
					
					La Union de la Juventud debe materializar el ideal y principios del partido en materia de la politica exterior para fomentar la solidaridad antiimperialista, la amistad y la unidad con los jovenes progresistas del mundo y contribuir activamente al desarrollo del movimiento juvenil del mundo.
					
					Para acoger la era de maxima prosperidad del movimiento juvenil de Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, la Union de la Juventud tiene que fortalecer sus organizaciones y elevar por todos los medios su funcion combativa y su papel.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que ante la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista y jovenes coreanos, que avanzan a pasos firmes por la ruta de la revolucion coreana, indicada por el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, esta abierto el futuro radiante y es muy prometedora la perspectiva del movimiento juvenil coreano, y llamo a luchar con dinamismo por el cumplimiento de la causa socialista del Juche, la transformacion de la Union de la Juventud segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y el futuro radiante de la potencia juvenil.
